text: Xanthophorus is a genus of leaf beetles in the subfamily Eumolpinae. It is distributed in South Asia. ==Species== * Xanthophorus andrewesi (Jacoby, 1903) * Xanthophorus balyi (Jacoby, 1903) * Xanthophorus carinatus Jacoby, 1908 * Xanthophorus flavopilosus (Jacoby, 1887) * Xanthophorus fuscipennis Jacoby, 1908 * Xanthophorus laevicollis Jacoby, 1908 * Xanthophorus lemoides (Walker, 1858) * Xanthophorus montanus Jacoby, 1908 * Xanthophorus nepalicus Medvedev & Sprecher-Uebersax, 1999 * Xanthophorus nigricollis Jacoby, 1908 * Xanthophorus nigripennis (Jacoby, 1900) * Xanthophorus pallidus (Jacoby, 1903) * Xanthophorus seriatus Weise, 1922 ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Chrysomelidae genera Category:Beetles of Asia Category:Taxa named by Martin Jacoby
title: Xanthophorus
